# Product.SubscriptionInfo.RenewalInfo.PriceIncreaseStatus.noIncreasePending

**Case**

There’s no pending price increase for the auto-renewable subscription.

## Declaration

```swift
case noIncreasePending
```

## Discussion

For more information about this value, see [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/managing-price-increases-for-auto-renewable-subscriptions].

## Getting Price Increase Status

- **Product.SubscriptionInfo.RenewalInfo.PriceIncreaseStatus.agreed**: The auto-renewable subscription is subject to a price increase.
- **Product.SubscriptionInfo.RenewalInfo.PriceIncreaseStatus.pending**: The customer hasn’t yet responded to an auto-renewable subscription price increase that requires customer consent.
